kanda udarata aithihasika 1818 karalla siduwi wasara 200k sapirena me mohothe rata bera ganimata thibena eelanga satana dushanayata erehi satana bawath, ada pirisidu deshapalana wyaparayaka ayithiya saha urumaya thibenne shri lanka nidahas pakshayata pamanak bawath nokiliti deshapalana wyaparayak wu shri lanka nidahas pakshaya samanga athwal banda ganimin samruddhimath ratak godanangimata mema pebarawari 10 wanada rate siyalu janathawa pelagasiya yuthu bawath janadhipathiwaraya prakasha kaleya.
